betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Harvesting Pumpkins for your Primal Shrooms gave you some inspiration. Those stems are quite sturdy, able to support a whole block. Given a bit of Essentia, what else could you convince these plants to grow for you?

The answer turns out to be "not very much". The process is quite a bit more taxing on the seeds than you expected. But one managed to survive your experiments.

Redlon is a changed melon seed (pumpkin seeds, for whatever reason, refuse to work) that grows blocks of Redstone. Albeit, slower than a regular melon seed would grow melons.

The next question is how to automate harvesting these things, as you'd rather not do so manually. And given that blocks of Redstone emit a redstone signal perhaps there's a simple solution to this one...
